page.title: 14THE INDUSTRIAL SITE
page.content: The {Industrial Site}has been there for about twenty years but the factories have changed over the years. One of the factories is{Ravensail}it has been on the{Industrial Site}for two years. They set up a business here because the owner lived in Okehampton. They have 14 self-employed workers and they make boats. They also have a removal service. { D&D fruit}have been on the{Industrial {Site}for two months. They set up a business here because they were sending a van down from Barnstable every day. Very soon{G.R.Spinks}will be moving up to{Exeter Road Industrial {Site}and hopefully{Bondelivery}will be moving into their premises once they have moved. { Cranmere}is another factory and they make ladies' clothes. Their old place was too small so they had to move.
